spell1.name: GAMMA RAY GUN
spell1.description: Fire with a Gamma Ray Gun.

spell2.name: PUNY BANNER
spell2.description: Transform from Bruce Banner into Hero Hulk.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Caster is immobilized during the transformation and gains Invincibility

spell3.name: GAMMA GRENADE
spell3.description: Launch a Gamma Grenade to inflict damage and Launch Up enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile with a downward delay that creates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Entering the spell field restores 50 Gamma Energy

spell4.name: RADIOACTIVE LOCKDOWN
spell4.description: Irradiate enemies, rendering them immobilized and immune to all ability effects until prematurely removed by certain attacks.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Heavy Blow and Gamma Burst can damage irradiated enemies and prematurely remove the status

spell5.name: GAMMA BURST
spell5.description: Emit gamma-ray bursts that pierce enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile that can pierce through enemies

spell6.name: HEAVY BLOW
spell6.description: Swing fists forward to punch enemies.

spell7.name: GAMMA FASTBALL (Team-Up)
spell7.description: Wolverine and Hulk can team up: Hulk lifts and hurls Wolverine forward after both confirm.

attributes.label: TEAM-UP BONUS
attributes.value: Hero Hulk and Monster Hulk gain 150 Max Health

spell8.name: HULK SMASH!
spell8.description: Transform from Hero Hulk into Monster Hulk for a limited time.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Caster is immobilized during the transformation and gains Invincibility

spell9.name: HEAVY BLOW — MONSTER HULK
spell9.description: Stronger, longer-range punches while transformed into Monster Hulk.

spell10.name: RADIOACTIVE LOCKDOWN — MONSTER HULK
spell10.description: Faster variant while transformed into Monster Hulk.

spell11.name: GAMMA BURST — MONSTER HULK
spell11.description: Slower projectile but much stronger while transformed into Monster Hulk.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile that can pierce through enemies

spell12.name: WORLD BREAKER
spell12.description: Grab an enemy and deliver a series of devastating slams.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: While smashing, Hulk gains 30% Damage Reduction

spell13.name: GAMMA BOOST (Team-Up Passive)
spell13.description: Charges Doctor Strange and Iron Man with gamma radiation to modify their ultimates; also grants Hulk bonus Max Health while an Anchor.

attributes.label: TEAM-UP BONUS
attributes.value: Hero Hulk and Monster Hulk gain 150 Max Health (as Anchor)
